transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Haan ji bhabhi ji?
Executive: Haan ji bolo.
Customer: Pranshu bol raha hu sir India mart se kal call kiya tha na aap shayad usme bhi abhi free hai kya sir?
Executive: 10-15 minute mein aap call karta hu chalega?
Customer: Chaliye chaliye koi issue nahi hai main aap 15 minute mein call kariye main aisa kar raha hu ek closing aati hai kuch work kar raha hu to aapke baad ek feedback aayega sir mere pe usse yes kar dijiyega.
Executive: To aapka theek ho jayega aapka pura baki main fir 15 minute baad call.
Customer: Haan pakka pakka sure 10-15 minute pakka karna main aapse.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai bas okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to know if the executive is free to talk.

- Customer mentions a feedback request and asks the executive to approve it.



Resolution:

- Executive asks to call back in 10-15 minutes.

- Executive confirms to call back in 15 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Executive will call back in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

call, feedback, time
